Reviews.Title: Great product! Quick shipping!
Reviews.Author: Gentle Deer Lion Tamer
Reviews.Content: We are happy with this TV. It is as described in all aspects. Very quick to ship. As an Amazon Prime member, this TV was received in less that two days. Well packaged also.The sound is excellent, and the quality of the picture is great. The remote works as well, with no complications. The headphone jack is always a plus for the quiet, do not disturb viewing times. The USB jack will be useful as well. All in all, for a great price, you get a product with numerous accessories built in that you would expect only on a more expensive set.Manuals were included, but prior to receiving the set, I went online and was able to download a PDF manual as well.

Reviews.Title: Excellent picture and sound
Reviews.Author: Lorenzo8D "Horn player"
Reviews.Content: Voice sounds are very clear and easy to understand; great for hearing voices at low volume.  An attractive, lightweight TV.  I'm very satisfied.  Amazon shipping was fast.  Comes with its exposed TV box, so you don't want it sitting outside at your door for very long.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for intended use - Bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: SirTaz "Geniebugged"
Reviews.Content: Having had Phillips/Magnavox Products for many years, took a chance on just the one review. Have [Analog w. convertor boxes] 2 other TVs/23 inch Phillips, now 9 yrs old and 13 inch now 14/15 yrs old. Set up was sooooooooooooo easy as well as Amazon excellent shipping/Expediting. Ordered the 8th/Fri. and rec'd Tuesday the 12th of June - Always watch for the 'SOLD by Amazon' specials - and this was one of them. No looking back in sight.

Reviews.Title: Great TV
Reviews.Author: Joey K. Simmons Sr
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV to use in kitchen and move around to watch  college football with my son and MY SAINTS. Read reviews on amazon and compared to others on site, this one stood out because of picture quality and built in sound. Out of all HDTV's we on this one has the best picture and built in features and can hookup to laptop with vga cable. Had it for a little while very easy to setup. Highly recommend you will love clarity of picture and anti glare screen.

Reviews.Title: good choice
Reviews.Author: Maggie
Reviews.Content: I purchased a 19 inch Samsung from Best Buy, choosing a more expensive model to get a good picture and sound quality. I was very disappointed with both picture and sound. So much so, that I returned it. After reading the reviews on Amazon for this 19" Magnavox, I ordered it. I'm happy to say it is a much better product than the Samsung for less money. The sound is not quite what I had hoped for, a little 'tinny', but still ok for the price.

Reviews.Title: Poor out of box quality
Reviews.Author: MWS
Reviews.Content: Ordered this based on the reviews posted here. Have been happy with Magnavox in the past. TV was delivered promptly from Amazon. Box appeared to be in good shape. TV did not work when I turned it on. Screen had a faint blue glow when powered up and that was it. Followed the trouble shooting guide in the manual with no success. Called the Magnavox customer service department. The service representative was courteous and professional, and quickly determined a replacement was in order. The real disappointment is that I have to wait 7-10 business days for the return packaging and was told it will be another 2-4 weeks after they receive the return before I will see the replacement. Bummer!

Reviews.Title: bought Magnavox tv from Amazon
Reviews.Author: Shopper maven "Too busy to write this."
Reviews.Content: The television works great, confirming my choice of Magnavox (longest lasting tv I've ever owned was a Magnavox).Delivery was super fast, as usual, from Amazon.The sound could be a little louder.....I do have it on a bracket, so the volume should be louder, as the speakersare underneath.

Reviews.Title: Good HDTV for Short Money
Reviews.Author: Chris
Reviews.Content: Amazon is the best for buying TVs, trust me. Easy Return and Price Matching!This TV was very easy to setup out of the Box.Remote is easy to use.Picture is sharp and looks fine.I use this tv in my basement and its perfect for a small space. Very thin and can fit in tight spaces.Kitchens especially!!

Reviews.Title: ********AWESOME********
Reviews.Author: Lindasm "Lindasm"
Reviews.Content: Oh by the way, Did I say AWSOME?????  This 19 inch Magnavox is AWSOME!!!  Easy to set up, easy to put the stand on and easy to program.  Just connect the plug to the strip the cable to Antenna, (that is what I use) then turn it on.  It gives you ALL on screen instructions.  Its great and has an AWSOME picture on it.  I can not say enough about this TV.  I laid down on my bed and it is sitting on my chest, Linnen chest, and it has a perfect picture.  NO GHOST looking people at all as I had read about another tv.  If you are looking for a GREAT bedroom or Kitchen TV you have found one.  I know I did!!!  Here along Christmas or right after the first of the year i'll be getting another to go in my computer room.  That is how much I LOVE THIS TV.If Is is Sold by Amazon.com and Shipped by Amazon.com you CANNOT GO WRONG.  Besides all that, it came a day early YIPEEEEEEE!!!!  It ALWAYS does threw Amazon.  I love you Amazon, and Thank you so very much for having such GREAT products and GREAT prices!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Have Always Had Good Experiences With Magnavox
Reviews.Author: Reno J
Reviews.Content: I've had dozens & dozens of TVs over my 56 years & currently have 13 TVs in my 2 homes. I've owned several Magnavox TVs over the years & have never gotten a bad one. They may not be the best TVs I've ever owned compared to my Samsungs, Toshibas, Sonys, etc., but they've always been pretty good TVs for the price. Case in point: a week ago I found myself having to buy 5 new TVs in one day of various sizes. I bought 3 Magnavoxes, 1 Element & 1 Sanyo. The Sanyo is OK, the Element is horrible. The Magnavoxes are good.This reviewed 19-inch Magnavox that I purchased from Amazon for a kitchen is a gem compared to the 19-inch Element I bought for the other kitchen only because it was clearance-priced at Target for $95. Where the Element's picture is washed out unless one views it "dead-on" in front of the screen, the Magnavox is bright with deep, rich color & good contrast from multiple viewing angles. The audio on the Magnavox also shames the Element.As it stands now, I will always be a fan of Magnavox as a good value for the money & would recommend it to anyone not wanting or unable to spend much more on "high-end" brands.

Reviews.Title: Great little TV
Reviews.Author: MJF
Reviews.Content: Actually it doesn't seem so small. I have it in my small workroom close to where I work and it fills my need exactly. The price was right, the quality is great. No complaints what-so-ever.

Reviews.Title: Magnavox 19ME402V/F7 19-Inch 720p Class LED LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: Jim Weaverling
Reviews.Content: TV arrived in excellent condition.  Works great for my purposes in the bedroom.  Replaced a 13"CRT type TV And found it to be the perfect size to sit on top of the Directv receiver.  Perfect picture and sound and easy to set up.  Would recommend this TV for someone looking for a small flat-screen TV.

Reviews.Title: CEASED TO FUNCTION IN THREE MONTHS OF USE
Reviews.Author: REDSHIRT
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality, a great buy, functioned well, (While it worked), great picture quality.  However, it stopped working after three months of little use.  I just mailed it today for an exchange request.  Hoping that it is an isolated issue, not many of them would fail.  I checked all the basic troubleshooting, loose connection, remote battery, power in the outlet, main buttons (not the remote), and just stopped working.

Reviews.Title: Magnavox 19-inch 720p Class LED LCD HDTV
Reviews.Author: DJ "DJE"
Reviews.Content: I have a 42' Magnavox and when I wanted to purchase a smaller one thought I would try another Magnavox.  I have been very satisfied with the TV.  Very easy to set up.  I got the TV on time.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: Maxine Flam
Reviews.Content: I was looking for an inexpensive TV to replace my 19" set that went out a couple of months ago.  I waited for Cyber Monday and found this set.  It was a good price and met my expectations.  It also works with my VCR/DVD combo player which was another important point.  I would recommend this set to anyone looking for a smaller TV.

Reviews.Title: Great deal
Reviews.Author: mom of 2
Reviews.Content: Great picture quality and space saving. Well worth the $! We purchased it for our daughters bedroom and she is thrilled.

Reviews.Title: A Good Little TV
Reviews.Author: Robert S. Boston
Reviews.Content: The Magnavox 19ME402V/F7 is a good fit for my kitchen. Small enough to be unobtrusive, large enough to be viewed from anywhere in the room. Like most flat TV's I've experienced it has lousy sound (no roomy cabinet to act as a resonator) but it does have an analog headphone output that allows me to use a small but excellent Altec Lansing sound system intended for use with a computer.The TV has a very good picture,and the inputs I need for the cable box (HDMI) and the DVD recorder (component). I do wish I had a little more control over the aspect ratio of the picture when trying to expand letterbox movies to fill the screen. But that's a minor nitpick. Overall, I'm very satisfied with the set.

Reviews.Title: Great bedroom TV
Reviews.Author: Kim H.
Reviews.Content: This little TV is pretty nice.  It has bright colors, and crisp, clear display - beats the hell out of the little tube TV it is replacing.

Reviews.Title: Kitchen TV
Reviews.Author: Barilski
Reviews.Content: Very sharp picture, good colors. Audio is very good and clear and you can hear it over the normal kitchen noise if you want.

Reviews.Title: Nice TV, Great Buy
Reviews.Author: Snoopy 15
Reviews.Content: Bought this for a computer monitor at the office, having TV capability was a plus.  Fast shipping, would highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Great product
Reviews.Author: Virginia Jones "hooked on books"
Reviews.Content: This television has a great picture and the sound quality is also very good. We are very happy with both the product and the prompt delivery.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Edward E. Peoples
Reviews.Content: I just bought one of these TVs for a small office.  It is great.  Easy to hookup and program.  Perfect color and sound.  Also, it is very compatable with my Magnavox vcr/dvd recorder/player.Enjoy!!

Reviews.Title: I Love It!!!
Reviews.Author: Skitz
Reviews.Content: This is the first TV I've ever owned on my own. I wanted a TV for my bedroom so I could play video games in there without being disturbed by someone wanting to watch TV. This TV is awesome! It's so simple to set up and use, and it feels pretty sturdy but light. Picture quality is great and sound is AMAZING. The speakers on this thing are beasts! Hooked up my laptop to it via HDMI to watch some Blu-Ray rips I had of Avengers etc. They look even better on the TV than on my laptop's HD screen. The description says the TV is 720p but mines can set to 1080p. I dunno if that's normal or if I got lucky lol. It's well lit, then screen, and my games look great. I'm very pleased with this purchase and I hope it lasts long because Magnavox I heard is a very reliable brand name. You can't beat this TV at it's price.EDIT: This tv is so great I bought another for my girlfriend to keep in her bedroom too!

Reviews.Title: Quit working after 1.5 years!
Reviews.Author: patti brewer
Reviews.Content: We did not love this small tv for our kitchen when we got it, but we kept it b/c the reviews were so wonderful. So yesterday it would not turn on at all! Troubleshooted all things. Still will not turn on. Of course it cannot be returned via Amazon. Will see if Magnavox will do anything. Other big gripe is about the speakers. They are on the back of the tv. That was not a good thing in our kitchen. Will try to find replacement with speakers in the front. Noticed this tv is not available on Amazon now.

Reviews.Title: Good Value for the price
Reviews.Author: Roger T.
Reviews.Content: Easy set-up and clear picture.  Have had no problems with it and am very satisfied with the picture.  I would recommend this to a friend.

Reviews.Title: Short life
Reviews.Author: Karen M. Hill
Reviews.Content: Had this TV for a little over a year and it suddenly stopped working.  It was used less than an hour a day on average and without warning, quit.  Would not recommend this TV.

Reviews.Title: Bought in Feb - Died in Sept.
Reviews.Author: Allan M. Gathercoal "fdoamerica"
Reviews.Content: NO BRAINER: Buy the extended warranty .... I liked the HDTV then one night it went 'poof' then black... never to return... the little tv left for Magnavox heaven... I called support and luckily I was under the warranty... They will replace the unit... but, really a HDTV should last longer than a few months.  That said,  I used this unit exclusively  for photo playback.  You can download your photos to a USB and then have the monitor flip through them at various speeds.  Beats those little 9" photo frames.  Conditionally recommended with an extended warranty.

Reviews.Title: so so
Reviews.Author: Mike
Reviews.Content: Its a little grainy on the cable and doesn't fill the whole screen. more like a 15" Looks nice with a DVD

Reviews.Title: Great little TV for the bedroom
Reviews.Author: Truthinadvertising
Reviews.Content: This is a great little TV for the bedroom.  I found the sound quality to be fine, the picture to be great.  I am very pleased.  As I said, this is for our bedroom so I wasn't looking to hook it up to the internet or any other functionality.Great product for my use!

Reviews.Title: Great little TV Magnavox quality at generic price
Reviews.Author: Samantha Siver
Reviews.Content: Got this for a kitchen TV shipped quick and we love it worth the money great picture with just over the air antenna

Reviews.Title: I didn't like it.
Reviews.Author: Charlie
Reviews.Content: Returned this thing the next day. Tried to use it as a computer monitor and the resolution was screwed up on every setting I tried. I looked into it and many others have this issue online. It might serve well as an affordable television, but don't use this as a monitor (which it is advertised to do well).

Reviews.Title: TV for the office
Reviews.Author: Gary Baugh
Reviews.Content: The picture is perfect the sound is great and setting up the tv was effortless. I would highley recomend this tv.

Reviews.Title: Great size TV for bedroom
Reviews.Author: Vicky Woolfe
Reviews.Content: I love the size and overall quality of this television,  I purchased as an "after the holidays" gift to myself to replace a dionasaur of a TV I  had in my bedroom.  This item is sleek, lighweight, set up easily and has great picture quality.  If you are considering a small inexpensive TV, this would make a good choice.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: kirshey
Reviews.Content: it  was deleved on time it was very easy to get it out and set it up works very good

Reviews.Title: GREAT TV, EASY TO SET UP
Reviews.Author: upstream
Reviews.Content: I've had this tv for a couple of weeks now. Wanted to get a new tv in time for the upcoming Super Bowl game. (Go, 49ers!!!)  This tv is so great.  You plug it in, and it basically programs itself.  You answer a couple of questions, it automatically scans for channels, and you're good to go!! (It requires an antenna - either outdoors or indoors.  I have a very small indoor HDTV antenna attached to the set, and it works just great.) The resolution is excellent, and the sound is very nice; not tinny-sounding or too loud or too soft.  Just perfect.  All that said, I was disappointed in the tiny plastic stand that's bundled with this tv.  The plastic stand is quite small, given the size and weight of the tv set, and the screws that secure the tv to the stand are so short they do not provide a secure base on which to stand the tv, thereby leaving the tv wobbling back and forth on the stand...so, you have to be very careful not to jar the tv for fear of knocking it off the stand, and having it tumble to the floor.  Other than the flimsy plastic stand, I think this tv is a good buy, and I'm glad I made the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Basic small TV good for kitchen
Reviews.Author: Richard Hubbell
Reviews.Content: Bought this based on other positive reviews.  Was considering a Samsung with a slimmer case, but read that it didn't have as many (or any) audio and video jacks.  While I don't have any other inputs to connect right now, I didn't want to limit my options later.  Everything works ok and sound is ok for a small unit.  My only issue is that the screen seems a bit dim.  Perhaps I selected an energy saving home mode rather than a commercial mode, but I can't seem to change it now to check that out.

Reviews.Title: Gift for the Wife
Reviews.Author: THE NJM
Reviews.Content: This small HD TV works and is a great addition to the room where we wanted it. It is a great space saver and the picture quality is fine.

Reviews.Title: satisfied
Reviews.Author: Mario G. Agnello
Reviews.Content: I am pleased with this tv. I received the order promptly. It was a good value. It is perfect fit for us.

Reviews.Title: Maganavox 19" television
Reviews.Author: MICHAEL ADAMS
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my kitchen and I have nothing bad to say about this television, other than the 19" tv's of today is not as big as the 19" tv's a few years back. The picture and sound is great, it is lightweight and easy to use.

Reviews.Title: very good tv.
Reviews.Author: Wilton Medina
Reviews.Content: i like it a lot.  very cheap and really a good tv set. i own this for a few months and i really love it

Reviews.Title: Great picture!
Reviews.Author: Tallulah
Reviews.Content: Great little tv for the kitchen. It arrived quickly, and was ready right out of the box, just need to attach the base. Great  picture!

Reviews.Title: Nice Tv
Reviews.Author: Teener
Reviews.Content: Nice Little TV for the price, Bought this tv to put in my Grandsons room to watch his movies on.

Reviews.Title: Perfect for home office use
Reviews.Author: NMBioguy "NMBioguy"
Reviews.Content: I purchased this so I could monitor the transfer of my VHS tapes as they are copied to DVD.  I have a digital antenna for connection to broadcast television as well.  The quality of the picture is excellent and the sound is very good too.  The television was easy to set up and connect (though it does require a screwdriver to secure the base to the TV).  Picture quality is excellent and even makes 20 year old VHS tapes look good!

Reviews.Title: Great Buy
Reviews.Author: hi
Reviews.Content: Excellant pictures and sound. Great for the kitchen.  I did not have any of the problems some had in their reviews.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for the price
Reviews.Author: jammac
Reviews.Content: Ordered Magnavox 19ME402V/F7 19-inch HDTV to replace an old 9-inch under the counter GE model that quit working after 18 years.  Size is perfect on the countertop and actually takes up less space than the old TV.  Set-up and attaching the base were a breeze.  Instruction manual is clear to follow, making fine tuning adjustments easy.  Picture is sharp and sound is good, though I do need to set volume higher when the environment is more noisy than usual.  Black color matches other appliances but does attract dust - no surprise there.  Remote is basic and simple to use.  A great value for the price with all the features I wanted for watching TV in the kitchen.  So far, I'm happy with this purchase and can recommend this model.

Reviews.Title: Great TV for my bedroom
Reviews.Author: D. Smith
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV for my bedroom.  It has a really picture and works great.  I needed a sleep timer and was glad that it came with one.  So far no problems at all with this TV, highly recommended.  thanks!

Reviews.Title: Amazing picture
Reviews.Author: J. Hollon
Reviews.Content: I wasn't sure about this tv the reviews were good but not excellent but I'm in love....the picture quality is amazing and when paired with my blue ray you feel like you are in a theater.  Sound is clear and strong and the picture is amazing.  Perfect tv for a small room like a bedroom or kitchen.  Mine is in my scraproom and I'm in love.

Reviews.Title: Poor
Reviews.Author: Nicholas
Reviews.Content: Product box had hole in it, Shipping box (untouched). Remote Missing, Screws for mount missing.TV had scratches and buffs all over it. When i went to turn it on just darkness, no lights, no responce. Very frustrated...Nick

Reviews.Title: I didn't like the remote or the reception
Reviews.Author: C2000
Reviews.Content: I lost NBC, so I went back to my old TV and converter box. I only get 3-4 channels as it is. I only bought this for the headphone jack, so I'll just have to go without for now. This is the only TV I could find with a headphone jack. The antenna jack gets very hot and since this is my first LED TV, maybe this is normal. The edges on the remote control are somewhat sharp and uncomfortable. The previous channel button is above the volume button, making it hard to find. The menu buttons are on the bottom, which I don't like. I'd prefer the channel buttons and previous channel button on the bottom. All my other remotes have smooth comfortable edges and easy to find previous channel buttons. The guide only shows what's on and not the next show, unlike my other TV.

ProductInfo.Features:
High-Definition Edge-lit LED LCD Display
Convenient Side HDMI Input
SRS TruSurround XT / Doby Digital Output
Recognized as the Most Efficient of ENERGY STAR 2012
PC Input via VGA and HDMI Ports
ProductInfo.Name: Magnavox 19ME402V/F7 19-Inch 720p Class LED LCD HDTV
